vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κῠβέρν-ησις,
Doric dialect κῠβέρν-ᾱσις, εως, ἡ, steering, pilotage, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 metaphorically, government, πολίων of cities, [NT+5th c.BC+]; θεοῦ by a god, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: administration; derived from a Greek verb meaning "to steer a ship, to guide," not found in the NT
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
administration; derived from a Greek verb meaning "to steer a ship, to guide," not found in the NT
government, office of a governor, or director; metonymy a director, 1Cor. 12:28*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cai quản; kẻ có tài quản trị; người quản trị
